SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Content], [t].[CreateDate], [t].[LastModified], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [u].[Id], [u].[BirthDate], [u].[BirthPlace], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[UserName], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Name]
FROM (
    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId]
    FROM [Essays] AS [e]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Classifications] AS [c] ON [e0].[ClassificationId] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [u].[Id], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id]

LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Classifications] AS [c] ON [e0].[ClassificationId] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id]

SET NOCOUNT ON;
UPDATE [Essays] SET [Content] = @p0, [CreateDate] = @p1, [LastModified] = @p2, [Title] = @p3, [UserId] = @p4
WHERE [Id] = @p5;
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT;

    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [e].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE ([e].[Id] = @__essayId_0) AND ([e].[UserId] = @__userId_1)
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Classifications] AS [c] ON [e0].[ClassificationId] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]

    SELECT TOP(2) [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[BirthDate], [u].[BirthPlace], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [Essays] AS [e]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [e].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE ([e].[Id] = @__essayId_0) AND ([e].[UserId] = @__userId_1)
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Classifications] AS [c] ON [e0].[ClassificationId] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id]

SET NOCOUNT ON;
UPDATE [Essays] SET [Content] = @p0, [CreateDate] = @p1, [LastModified] = @p2, [Title] = @p3, [UserId] = @p4
WHERE [Id] = @p5;
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT;

    WHERE ([e].[Id] = @__essayId_0) AND ([e].[UserId] = @__userId_1)
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Classifications] AS [c] ON [e0].[ClassificationId] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id]

2020-06-29 18:59:57.744 +08:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (41ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Essays] AS [e]
2020-06-29 18:59:58.024 +08:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (60ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Content], [t].[CreateDate], [t].[LastModified], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [u].[Id], [u].[BirthDate], [u].[BirthPlace], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[UserName], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Name]
FROM (
    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId]
    FROM [Essays] AS [e]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Classifications] AS [c] ON [e0].[ClassificationId] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [u].[Id], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id]
2020-06-29 18:59:58.417 +08:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)

    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId]
    FROM [Essays] AS [e]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]

    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId]
    FROM [Essays] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[UserId] = @__userId_0
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_1 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_2 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Classifications] AS [c] ON [e0].[ClassificationId] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(2) [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[BirthDate], [u].[BirthPlace], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [Essays] AS [e]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [e].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE ([e].[Id] = @__essayId_0) AND ([e].[UserId] = @__userId_1)
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Classifications] AS [c] ON [e0].[ClassificationId] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id]

Executing controller action with signature System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1[Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.IActionResult] GetEssaySummaryAsync(MuchBlog.Domain.Helpers.Parameters.EssayResourceParameters) on controller MuchBlog.Api.Controllers.EssaySummaryController (MuchBlog.Api).
2020-06-29 22:24:24.372 +08:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 3.1.5 initialized 'BlogDbContext' using provider 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer' with options: None
2020-06-29 22:24:24.384 +08:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Essays] AS [e]
2020-06-29 22:24:24.435 +08:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (17ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Content], [t].[CreateDate], [t].[LastModified], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [u].[Id], [u].[BirthDate], [u].[BirthPlace], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[UserName], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Name]
FROM (
    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId]
    FROM [Essays] AS [e]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]

    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId]

    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Content], [t].[CreateDate], [t].[LastModified], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [u].[Id], [u].[BirthDate], [u].[BirthPlace], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[UserName], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Name]
FROM (
    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId]
    FROM [Essays] AS [e]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Classifications] AS [c] ON [e0].[ClassificationId] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [u].[Id], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id]

2020-06-29 22:41:42.439 +08:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Essays] AS [e]
2020-06-29 22:41:42.565 +08:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (115ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Content], [t].[CreateDate], [t].[LastModified], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [u].[Id], [u].[BirthDate], [u].[BirthPlace], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[UserName], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Name]
FROM (
    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId]
    FROM [Essays] AS [e]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Classifications] AS [c] ON [e0].[ClassificationId] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [u].[Id], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id]
2020-06-29 22:41:43.241 +08:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

2020-06-29 22:41:47.069 +08:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (15ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Content], [t].[CreateDate], [t].[LastModified], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [u].[Id], [u].[BirthDate], [u].[BirthPlace], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[UserName], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Name]
FROM (
    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId]
    FROM [Essays] AS [e]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Classifications] AS [c] ON [e0].[ClassificationId] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [u].[Id], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id]

FROM (
    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId]
    FROM [Essays] AS [e]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Classifications] AS [c] ON [e0].[ClassificationId] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]

    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId]

    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

SELECT TOP(1) [u].[Id], [u].[BirthDate], [u].[BirthPlace], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[UserName]
FROM [Users] AS [u]
WHERE [u].[Id] = @__p_0
2020-06-29 23:02:32.756 +08:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (7ms) [Parameters=[@__essayId_0='?' (DbType = Guid), @__userId_1='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Content], [t].[CreateDate], [t].[LastModified], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t].[Id0], [t].[BirthDate], [t].[BirthPlace], [t].[Email], [t].[Password], [t].[UserName], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Name]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(2) [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[BirthDate], [u].[BirthPlace], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [Essays] AS [e]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [e].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE ([e].[Id] = @__essayId_0) AND ([e].[UserId] = @__userId_1)
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Classifications] AS [c] ON [e0].[ClassificationId] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id]

) AS [t]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Content], [t].[CreateDate], [t].[LastModified], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [u].[Id], [u].[BirthDate], [u].[BirthPlace], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[UserName], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Name]
FROM (
    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Content], [e].[CreateDate], [e].[LastModified], [e].[Title], [e].[UserId]
    FROM [Essays] AS [e]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[ClassificationId], [e0].[EssayId], [c].[Id], [c].[Name]
    FROM [EssayClassifications] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Classifications] AS [c] ON [e0].[ClassificationId] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EssayId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [u].[Id], [t0].[ClassificationId], [t0].[EssayId], [t0].[Id]
